languages.text: {n}Равор кривится от окрика, словно громкий голос причинил ему боль.{/n} "Виноват, виноват, Лорд-капитан... простите великодушно! Только в том, что я рожей и характером не вышел, не только я виноват".

{n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор кривится от окрика, словно громкий голос причинил ему боль.{/n} "Виноват, виноват, Лорд-капитан... простите великодушно! Только в том, что я рожей и характером не вышел, не только я виноват".

traits.locale_text: {n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the loud sounds actually hurt.{/n} "My bad, my bad, Lord Cap'n... Begging your pardon! Except it's not just my fault I have an ugly mug and a foul temper."
{n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the loud sounds actually hurt.{/n} "My bad, my bad, Lord Cap'n... Begging your pardon! Except it's not just my fault I have an ugly mug and a foul temper."

{n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the loud sounds actually hurt.{/n} "My bad, my bad, Lord Cap'n... Begging your pardon! Please understand it's not just my fault I have an ugly mug and a foul temper."

{n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the loud sounds actually hurt.{/n} "My bad, my bad, Lord Cap'n... Begging your pardon! Please understand it's not just my fault I have an ugly mug and a foul temper."

{n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."

{n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."

languages.text: {n}当你吼起来的时候，雷沃脸上的肌肉抽搐着，仿佛你的声音对他造成了切实存在的伤害。{/n}“请原谅，请原谅，船长老大……我真的很抱歉！但我脾气和脸之所以这么臭，不能只赖在我自己头上。”
languages.original_text: {n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你吼起来的时候，雷沃脸上的肌肉抽搐着，仿佛你的声音对他造成了切实存在的伤害。{/n}“请原谅，请原谅，船长老大……我真的很抱歉！但我脾气和脸之所以这么臭，不能只赖在我自己头上。”

languages.text: {n}Cuando le gritas, Ravor se estremece como si el sonido le resultara doloroso.{/n} «Lo siento, lo siento, L{mf|ord|ady} Capi... ¡De verdad que lo siento! Pero la culpa de mi careto y de mi mal humor no es solo mía».
languages.original_text: {n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando le gritas, Ravor se estremece como si el sonido le resultara doloroso.{/n} «Lo siento, lo siento, L{mf|ord|ady} Capi... ¡De verdad que lo siento! Pero la culpa de mi careto y de mi mal humor no es solo mía».

languages.text: {n}あなたが叫ぶと、ラヴォアはその声が物理的な痛みを伴ったかのように身じろぎした。{/n}「申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン…申し訳ございません！ですが、私の醜さや粗野な振る舞いは、私だけの責任ではないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが叫ぶと、ラヴォアはその声が物理的な痛みを生じさせたかのように身じろぎした。{/n}「申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン…申し訳ございません！ですが、私の醜さや性質の粗さは、私だけの責任ではないのです」

languages.text: {n}Als du ihn anschreist, zuckt Ravor zusammen, als hättest du ihn geschlagen.{/n} "Verzeihung, Verzeihung, Lord Cap'n ... Ich entschuldige mich! Aber Ihr könnt nicht nur mich für meine hässliche Visage und meine schlechte Laune verantwortlich machen."
languages.original_text: {n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du ihn anschreist, zuckt Ravor zusammen, als hättest du ihn geschlagen.{/n} "Verzeihung, Verzeihung, Lord Cap'n ... Ich entschuldige mich! Aber Ihr könnt nicht nur mich für meine hässliche Visage und meine schlechte Laune verantwortlich machen."

languages.text: {n}Votre cri fait grimacer Ravor, comme s'il lui avait infligé une douleur physique.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Pardon... Toutes mes excuses ! Mais ma sale tronche et ma mauvaise humeur sont pas exclusivement de ma faute. »
languages.original_text: {n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre cri fait grimacer Ravor, comme s'il lui avait infligé une douleur physique.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Pardon... Toutes mes excuses ! Mais ma sale tronche et ma mauvaise humeur sont pas exclusivement de ma faute. »

languages.text: {n}Sen bağırınca Ravor sanki sesten fiziksel olarak incinmiş gibi irkiliyor.{/n} "Affedersiniz, çok affedersiniz Lord Kaptan... Özür dilerim ama çirkin sıfatımın ve aksiliğimin tek kabahatlisi ben değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}When you shout, Ravor winces as if the sound physically hurts.{/n} "Beg your pardon, beg your pardon, Lord Cap'n... I do apologise! But the blame for my ugly mug and foul temper can't be laid at my door only."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sen bağırınca Ravor sanki sesten fiziksel olarak incinmiş gibi irkiliyor.{/n} "Affedersiniz, çok affedersiniz Lord Kaptan... Özür dilerim ama çirkin sıfatımın ve aksiliğimin tek kabahatlisi ben değilim."
